error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'time_to_clean_bedrooms_minutes' (value: 60) was used instead of 'time_to_clean_bathroom_hours' (value: 2.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 62
It takes 3*20=<<3*20=60>>60 minutes to clean the living room
So it is 60/60=<<60/60=1>>1 hour
The bathroom takes 1*2=<<1*2=2>>2 hours
So all together the inside takes 1+1+60=<<1+1+60=62>>62 hours
The outside takes 62*2=<<62*2=124>>124 hours
So the chores take 62+124=<<62+124=186>>186 hours
He splits it 1+2=<<1+2=3>>3 ways
So he works 186/3=<<186/3=62>>62 hours
